

ISIS, or as they refer to themselves, “The Islamic State,” has launched a socialized health service called the Islamic State Health Service (ISHS), Daily Mail reports.

The imagery bears a striking resemblance to Britain’s socialized medicine program, the National Health Service (NHS).

A video surfaced online, featuring doctors talking about the services offered by ISHS. Two of the doctors are seen speaking English. They have been identified as Abu Muqatil al-Hindi and Abu Yusuf al-Australi.
